Defense was key for Phoenix , as they held Sacramento to 45 percent from the field and 37 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a huge factor as well , with Phoenix winning that battle , 39 - 43 . The Suns ( 16 - 34 ) had to play this game without Omri Casspi and Devin Booker , as they were able to pull out the win in this win . Devin Booker led the team in scoring , as he tallied 33 points , two rebounds and two assists . TJ Warren finished second on the team , dropping 21 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Tyson Chandler recorded a double - double off the bench , totaling 7 points and 12 rebounds . Ty Lawson led the bench with 18 points , five rebounds , three assists and two steals . Ben McLemore was second on the team , as he dropped 18 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Ty Lawson was the only other Sacramento player in double figures , as he accrued 18 points , five rebounds and three assists . On deck for the Kings is a road matchup against the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday . The Kings ( 19 - 31 ) have been one of the most dysfunctional teams over recent weeks , but wins like this show just how good they can be . Devin Booker was the player of the game , as he tallied 33 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals on 11 - of - 24 shooting . Eric Bledsoe finished with 20 points , six rebounds and four assists . TJ Warren finished second on the team , collecting 21 points , five rebounds and three assists . Brandon Knight was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 12 points , two rebounds and four assists .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 13 - 3 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 6 - 10 ) 91 - 80 on Wednesday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Spurs were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went 40 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were led by their superstar duo of Kawhi Leonard and Kawhi Leonard . Leonard finished with a game - high of 25 points ( 11 - 18 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , while also adding seven rebounds , six assists , four steals and five blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 40 points and 18 rebounds over his last two games . Danilo Gallinari was the only other starter in double figures , as he finished with 16 points ( 5 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 10 rebounds and two blocked shots . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 16 points and 7 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Will Barton finished with 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and nine rebounds . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Phoenix Suns on Wednesday , while the Nuggets will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday .

Dallas were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with a dominating second half . In fact , there were 13 ties and 16 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 13 points . The Pelicans were expected to win this game easily , but New Orleans took care of business in this wire - to - wire win . In fact , the Pelicans led for the entirety of the second half , as they held a double - digit lead for the entirety of the second half . Defense was key , as they held Charlotte to 41 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range , while the Hornets shot 41 percent from the field . Anthony Davis led the way for New Orleans , as he tallied 38 points , 16 rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Jrue Holiday finished second on the team with 22 points , two rebounds and nine assists . Marco Belinelli was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 22 points and 10 rebounds off the bench . Kemba Walker led the Pelicans in scoring , as he accrued 25 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Marco Belinelli was second on the team , as he dropped 22 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Tim Frazier was the only other starter with more than two points , as he accumulated 17 points , five rebounds and eight assists on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Marco Belinelli led the bench in scoring , as he provided 22 points and 4 - of - 9 from three - point range . Jrue Holiday accumulated 22 points , two rebounds and nine assists off the bench .

Davis added nine rebounds and five assists on 11 - of - 19 shooting . Lou Williams led the way for the Pelicans , with 27 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , including 7 - of - 11 from long range , along with two rebounds and two assists , in 25 minutes off the bench . Eric Gordon chipped in 19 points on 5 - of - 16 shooting , in 30 minutes off the bench , while Clint Capela double - doubled with 15 points on 7 - of - 8 shooting , including 0 - of - 0 from long range . Jrue Holiday chipped in 6 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting , in 24 minutes off the bench . The Rockets shot 50 percent from the field , including 39 percent from long range , while the Pelicans shot 42 percent from the field and only 19 percent from long range . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for the Pelicans with 27 points , 13 rebounds , five assists , five steals and four blocks , in 35 minutes .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 9 - 13 ) defeated the Allen Crabbe ( 12 - 9 ) , 88 - 67 , in Game 2 of the Eastern Conference Semifinals . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Bucks 16 - 12 in the first quarter and never looked back . They were led by Giannis Antetokounmpo , who scored 17 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 7 - 8 FT ) with nine rebounds , one assist , one steal and two blocks in 31 minutes . Greg Monroe had a solid game off the bench , scoring 16 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) to go with 12 rebounds and three assists in 27 minutes . The Trail Blazers were led by Damian Lillard , who finished with 23 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 3 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds and seven assists in 38 minutes . Damian Lillard also had a solid game , scoring 23 points ( 8 - 19 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt 4 - 4 FT ) , along with seven assists and five rebounds in 38 minutes . Khris Middleton added 14 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt ) , one rebound , three assists , two steals and one block in 41 minutes . Ed Davis had his best game of the year , scoring 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) with 13 rebounds , two assists , two blocks and one steal in 28 minutes . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be at home against the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday , while the Bucks will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .

The game was a tale of two halves , with the Jazz jumping out to a 18 - point lead after the first quarter and never looked back . Utah was led by Gordon Hayward who scored 20 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 4 - 6 FT ) with four rebounds , three assists and three steals in 30 minutes . Derrick Favors also had 16 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 6 FT ) , nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block in 36 minutes . Wesley Matthews had 13 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , seven rebounds , two assists and one steal in 32 minutes . Gordon Hayward led the Trail Blazers with 20 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , to go with three assists , four rebounds and three steals in 30 minutes of action . LaMarcus Aldridge had a double - double with 14 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) , eight rebounds and two assists , while Trey Burke added 19 points ( 9 - 20 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 1 - 3 FT ) and three assists . The Trail Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Trail Blazers will travel to Denver to play the Nuggets on Friday .

Paul George led the way for the Pacers with 30 points , seven rebounds , an assist , four steals and a block . Monta Ellis was a distant second with 17 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Thaddeus Young pitched in with 14 points , six rebounds , three assists , two steals and a block . Luol Deng was the only other member of the starting five with double - digit scoring , supplying 10 points , six rebounds and an assist . CJ Miles was productive off the bench with 19 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , including 3 - of - 8 from three - point range . Lou Williams led the way for the Pacers with 19 points , five assists and one rebound . Monta Ellis followed with 17 points , three rebounds , three assists , two blocks and two steals . Thaddeus Young provided a 14 - point , 6 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , two steals and one block . Myles Turner managed nine points , six rebounds , two assists and two blocks . C.J . Miles led the second unit with 16 points , two rebounds , one steal , one steal and one block . Paul George led the way for the Lakers with a game - high 30 points , which he supplemented with seven rebounds , one assist , four steals and one block . Monta Ellis was next with 17 points , two rebounds , three assists , two blocks and one steal . Thaddeus Young tallied a 14 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included three assists , two steals and one block . CJ Miles tallied 16 points , two rebounds , one block , one steal and one block in 23 minutes off the bench .

The Trail Blazers were the superior shooters in this one , going 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Knicks went 38 percent from the floor and 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers shot 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from beyond the arc , while the Trail Blazers shot 38 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line . The Trail Blazers were led by C.J . McCollum , who finished with 25 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , while adding two rebounds and two assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 42 points and 28 rebounds over his last two games . Kristaps Porzingis also had a strong showing , recording 11 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , seven rebounds and three blocked shots . He 's now averaging 11 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Arron Afflalo had 13 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt ) and six rebounds in 36 minutes . The Blazers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday , while the Knicks will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Wednesday .

The 76ers were the superior shooters in this game , going 39 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets went 43 percent from the floor and 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Sixers were also able to force the 76ers into 16 turnovers , while committing only nine of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The 76ers were led by a strong performance from Emmanuel Mudiay , who finished with 27 points ( 10 - 23 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and 11 rebounds . It was his third double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 29 points and 23 rebounds . However , the Thunder ( 0 - 1 ) were able to escape with a win to the Thunder ( 0 - 1 ) . The 76ers were led by Joel Embiid with 20 points , seven rebounds and a block in 22 minutes of action . Enes Kanter led the way for the Thunder , finishing with 17 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting , to go along with 12 rebounds , in 24 minutes off the bench . Joel Embiid was the high - point man for the 76ers , as he finished with 20 points on 6 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with seven rebounds and two blocks , in 22 minutes . Steven Adams followed up with 16 points , five rebounds and three steals , in 36 minutes . Sergio Rodriguez chipped in 12 points on 5 - of - 11 shooting , nine assists and four rebounds , in 32 minutes . Jerami Stauskas chipped in 13 points on 5 - of - 6 shooting , in 23 minutes off the bench , while Nik Stauskas chipped in 13 points , in 23 minutes off the bench . The Thunder shot 42 percent from the field , compared to the 76ers ' 43 percent . The 76ers ( 0 - 1 ) , meanwhile , shot only 43 percent from the field and 29 percent from the free - throw line .

The Pistons shot 48 percent from the field , compared to the Nuggets ' 33 percent shooting .
